task.title: Create a Post on Multiple Channels
task.shortdesc: Cross-posting is the act of sharing the exact same post across different social media platforms, or on the same account multiple times.

taskbody.context: This function supports social media marketers constantly trying to keep up with posting schedules.

step.cmd: Click New Post in the top-right corner of the dashboard. In the Post to Field select Twitter, Facebook and Instagram, one after the other.
Once you’ve created the post, go to the drop down button next to Publish and select Schedule. That will bring you to a window that’ll allow you to select a time you want your post to go up.
Now select the date and time you want your post to post.
